## OWebKeyStorage.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `OWebKeyStorage` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(_appContext: OWebApp, tagName: string, persistent?: boolean, maxLifeTime?: number);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  \_appContext | OWebApp | The app context. |
|  tagName | string | The key storage name. |
|  persistent | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> True to persists the key storage data. |
|  maxLifeTime | number | <i>(Optional)</i> The duration in seconds until key data deletion. |
